item.description:
Enjoy a leisure, easy bike ride along Nantasket Beach. Rentals available for only $15. These are brand new comfort bikes. Even if you have your own bike, you may want to rent one there. This is going to be a slow, relaxing, fun ride to take in some great views. We'll be biking ten flat miles round trip. Check out info on bike rentals.

After the bike ride, we'll grab some lunch at Daddy's Beach Club (known for having fabulous pizza) located on the beach.

After lunch we'll spend the afternoon on the beach. There is a bath house there for changing.

What to bring:
Beach Chair
Bike Helmet (helmets are also available at no extra charge with bike rentals)
Bathing suit
Water bottle
Suntan lotion
Money for bike rental, lunch, parking, and ice cream!

Arrive at the beach parking lot by 9:30 am. Cost to park is $7.00. A carpool will be leaving from Milford at 8:30 am. We can arrange other carpools once we see where people are coming from. When you RSVP "Yes" please state in the comments box where you are coming from if you would like to carpool.

Directions to exact location for beach parking will be posted later.

Rain date - Saturday, June 12. If this event is cancelled due to bad weather, an announcement will go out via email and posted on the site by Friday, 5 pm.
item.name: Bike and Beach at Nantasket
